tasks.title: Welcome to Prioritty
tasks.body: This is a demo task. Press 'e' to edit, 'd' to mark as done.

tasks.title: Learn the keybindings
tasks.body:
Use ? to see all available keybindings.

Navigation: j/k or arrows
Status: t (todo), p (in progress), d (done), c (cancelled)

tasks.title: Try the CLI commands
tasks.body:
Run 'pt --help' to see available commands.

Examples:
- pt list
- pt task add "New task"
- pt note add "New note"

notes.title: Demo Note
notes.body:
This is a demo note. Notes don't have status like tasks.

You can use notes for general information or documentation.
